summary: Psychiatrist Ty Adams doesn't believe in using drugs, but the head of Sedah State Hospital does, then 'Satan' arrives ~ walk-in patient extraordinaire... From there it's a full-on freaky ride.
cast: Michael Beach|Ronny Cox|Sinbad|Jane Carr|Shelley Robertson|Khylan Jones|Twink Caplan|John C. McGinley|David Backus|Matthew A. Thomas|William Bassett|Jim Ortlieb|Roberta Keith|Tom Everett|Ray Xifo|Tracy Pettit|Eriq La Salle|Tia Texada|J.P. Manoux|Chris Gann|Marty Yost|Fran Bennett|Mylo Ironbear|R. Sky Palkowitz|Allison Queal|Elvis Strange
title: Crazy as hell
